name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who proudly serves as a member of the WebtrES club. Equipped with a sturdy box-like body and classic soldier-style buttons and arms, Circuit is always ready for action. Its vibrant cat-themed screen adds a touch of playfulness to its appearance, reflecting its friendly and approachable personality. To ensure maximum safety on its missions, Circuit is also equipped with a protective helmet, enhancing its resilience. With its exceptional ability_scores and skills, Circuit is a reliable companion and a valuable asset to the WebtrES club.
